name: Canuris: Atlas And Amber
description:
Fight epic battles in this Classically Styled SRPG:

Atlas was a nerd who only wanted to practice swordfighting and mess around with magitech gadgets. Amber was a teenager with nothing to do except smoke a lot of weed and cigarettes' and eat mushrooms with her boyfriend Corvus, That was until the raiders showed up. now she has to fight everyday while being stalked by some less than savory characters.  The game is currently in development but the demo has 6 available missions.

CONTROLS

Z to confirm/select 

X to cancel or speed up gameplay

C to toggle enemy range

arrow keys to move
